name: Avoid the Light
description:
Avoid the Light

You've died. Well almost. As you race through your unconscious mind, can you avoid Heaven's light? Maybe you can find a second chance... or will the inevitability of death consume you?

Created for Mini Jam 119: Heaven^2 - Everything Dies.

  • W = Speed up
  • A = Slow down
  • A = Move Left
  • D = Move Right

Second chances (dice) cause the light to retreat.

Inevitabilities (skulls) cause the light to pursue faster.
